problem.title: Problem solved
problem.content: The lack of centralized and interactive information on points of interest in Cameroon makes it difficult to discover the hidden treasures of the country. Our platform fills this gap by offering an immersive and comprehensive experience.

vision.title: Global vision
vision.content: To become the essential reference for discovering Cameroon's heritage, enhancing the cultural, natural, and historical richness of the country through an innovative technological platform accessible to all.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.content: Map, document, and promote Cameroon's points of interest to facilitate their discovery by tourists, researchers, and locals, while preserving and enhancing the national heritage.

about.title: About CameroonPOI
about.subtitle: Discover our mission, vision, and the team behind the Cameroon points of interest platform.

ourStory.title: Our story
ourStory.content1: CameroonPOI was born from a shared passion for Cameroon and its cultural, natural, and historical richness. Faced with the observation of a lack of centralized and interactive resources to discover the wonders of the country, we decided to create a platform that would allow everyone to explore, contribute, and share the hidden treasures of Cameroon.
ourStory.content2: Launched in 2025, our project aims to become the reference in terms of discovering Cameroon's heritage, offering an immersive and informative user experience. We firmly believe that technology can be a powerful vector for cultural enhancement and tourism promotion.
ourStory.content3: Today, CameroonPOI continues to grow thanks to an active and passionate community that contributes daily to enriching our database of points of interest.
